data.name: XGridControl
desc: An interface to a control that displays a tabular data.

methods.name: getColumnAtPoint
desc: retrieves the column which a given point belongs to

methods.name: getCurrentColumn
desc: returns the column index of the currently active cell
If the grid control's does not contain any cells (which happens if the grid column model does not contain any columns, or if grid data model does not contain any rows), then -1 is returned.

methods.name: getCurrentRow
desc: returns the row index of the currently active cell
If the grid control's does not contain any cells (which happens if the grid column model does not contain any columns, or if grid data model does not contain any rows), then -1 is returned.

methods.name: getRowAtPoint
desc: retrieves the row which a given point belongs to

methods.name: goToCell
desc: moves the cursor to the given cell
